creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: inscription with large characters in front panel; lightly colored landscape featuring bulbous, rocky mountains; calm bays; small buildings, a pagoda; trees; a few waterfalls, and a bridge
dimension:
10 9/16 × 189 15/16 in. (26.83 × 482.44 cm) (image, not including between mounts)
11 3/4 × 235 5/8 in. (29.85 × 598.49 cm) (mount, without roller, includes between image mounting)
inscription:
Signature, Inscriptions, and Seals

at end of scroll: [In the summer, the fifth month of 1822, it rains coninuously. So much so that it causes contagious diseases. In the deep shade of the verdant trees, I play with my brush to humor, a little, my longing for the wilderness]
medium: Ink and light color on paper; title and closing colophons/seals on silk
signed: L in image: [An old man at seventy-six, Kaiseki Ryu]
title: Landscape
